conjugations.exampleSentence: Io ho un libro
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I have a book

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu hai fame
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You are hungry

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei ha un gatto
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She has a cat

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi abbiamo tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We have time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avete ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You are right

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro hanno una casa
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They have a house

tenses.description: Used to describe actions happening now, general truths, or habitual actions. This is the most commonly used tense in Italian.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io avevo fame
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I was hungry

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avevi ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You were right

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei aveva un cane
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She had a dog

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avevamo tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We had time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avevate paura
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You were afraid

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro avevano una macchina
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They had a car

tenses.description: Used to describe ongoing, repeated, or habitual actions in the past. Also used for descriptions, states of being, and background information in storytelling.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io avrò tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I will have time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avrai successo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You will succeed

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei avrà un figlio
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She will have a child

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avremo fortuna
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We will be lucky

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avrete ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You will be right

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro avranno una festa
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They will have a party

tenses.description: Used to express future actions, predictions, or intentions. Often used with time expressions like 'domani' (tomorrow) or 'la prossima settimana' (next week).

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io ho avuto fortuna
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I have been lucky

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu hai avuto ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You have been right

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei ha avuto un figlio
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She has had a child

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi abbiamo avuto tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We have had time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avete avuto paura
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You have been afraid

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro hanno avuto una festa
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They have had a party

tenses.description: Used to express completed actions in the past that have a connection to the present. This is the most common past tense in spoken Italian.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io ebbi una rivelazione improvvisa leggendo quel libro
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I had a sudden revelation while reading that book

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avesti molte difficoltà durante quel periodo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You had many difficulties during that period

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei ebbe tre figli nel corso della sua vita
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She had three children during her life

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avemmo la fortuna di incontrare persone straordinarie
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We had the fortune to meet extraordinary people

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi aveste il coraggio di dire la verità
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You had the courage to tell the truth

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro ebbero molto successo nelle loro imprese
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They had a lot of success in their ventures

tenses.description: Used to describe completed actions in the distant past with no connection to the present. More common in Southern Italy and in formal writing, literature, and historical narratives.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io avevo avuto dei dubbi prima di prendere la decisione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I had had doubts before making the decision

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avevi avuto ragione a diffidare di lui
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You had been right to be wary of him

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei aveva avuto molti problemi prima di trovare questa soluzione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She had had many problems before finding this solution

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avevamo avuto il tempo di preparare tutto prima del loro arrivo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We had had time to prepare everything before their arrival

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avevate avuto l'occasione di viaggiare molto nella vostra gioventù
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You had had the opportunity to travel a lot in your youth

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro avevano avuto una grande festa prima di trasferirsi
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They had had a big party before moving

tenses.description: Used to express actions that were completed before another past action. Essential for establishing the sequence of past events, often used with 'prima' or 'dopo'.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io avrò avuto il tempo di finire prima del tuo ritorno
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I will have had time to finish before you return

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avrai certamente avuto notizie entro allora
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You will certainly have had news by then

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei avrà avuto cinquant'anni il mese prossimo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She will have been fifty years old next month

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avremo avuto abbastanza tempo per controllare tutto
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We will have had enough time to check everything

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avrete avuto l'occasione di riflettere prima di rispondere
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You will have had the opportunity to think before answering

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro avranno avuto diversi avvertimenti prima di essere sanzionati
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They will have had several warnings before being sanctioned

tenses.description: Used to express actions that will be completed before another future action or before a specific time in the future. Often used with time expressions like 'quando' or 'dopo che'.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io avrei tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I would have time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avresti ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You would be right

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei avrebbe un figlio
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She would have a child

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avremmo fortuna
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We would be lucky

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avreste paura
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You would be afraid

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro avrebbero una festa
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They would have a party

tenses.description: Used to express hypothetical situations, polite requests, or actions that would happen under certain conditions. Often used with 'se' (if) clauses.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Io avrei avuto più tempo se avessi cominciato prima
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I would have had more time if I had started earlier

conjugations.exampleSentence: Tu avresti avuto ragione a rifiutare quell'offerta
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You would have been right to refuse that offer

conjugations.exampleSentence: Lei avrebbe avuto una vita migliore se avesse fatto scelte diverse
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She would have had a better life if she had made different choices

conjugations.exampleSentence: Noi avremmo avuto meno problemi se fossimo stati meglio preparati
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: We would have had fewer problems if we had been better prepared

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voi avreste avuto l'occasione di incontrarlo se foste venuti
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: You would have had the opportunity to meet him if you had come

conjugations.exampleSentence: Loro avrebbero avuto più successo con una strategia diversa
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They would have had more success with a different strategy

tenses.description: Used to express hypothetical past actions or regrets about things that didn't happen. Often used to describe what would have happened under different circumstances.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che io abbia tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that I have time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che tu abbia ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that you are right

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che lei abbia fortuna
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that she is lucky

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che noi abbiamo tempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that we have time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che voi abbiate fortuna
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that you are lucky

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che loro abbiano una festa
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that they have a party

tenses.description: Used in dependent clauses after certain expressions of opinion, doubt, emotion, or necessity. Common triggers include 'spero che' (I hope that) and 'è importante che' (it's important that).

conjugations.exampleSentence: Abbi pazienza!
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Be patient!

conjugations.exampleSentence: Abbiamo coraggio!
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Let's be brave!

conjugations.exampleSentence: Abbiate fiducia!
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Have faith!

tenses.description: Used to give commands, orders, or instructions. Only exists for the second person (tu, voi) and first person plural (noi). The subject pronoun is usually omitted.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Credevo che io avessi abbastanza esperienza
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I believed that I had enough experience

conjugations.exampleSentence: Speravo che tu avessi capito la lezione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hoped that you had understood the lesson

conjugations.exampleSentence: Pensavo che lei avesse più tempo libero
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I thought that she had more free time

conjugations.exampleSentence: Volevano che noi avessimo più pazienza
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They wanted us to have more patience

conjugations.exampleSentence: Temevo che voi aveste dei problemi
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I feared that you had problems

conjugations.exampleSentence: Dubitavo che loro avessero le competenze necessarie
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I doubted that they had the necessary skills

tenses.description: Used in dependent clauses after expressions of doubt, emotion, or necessity when the main clause is in a past tense. Essential for expressing hypothetical situations in the past.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Spero che io abbia avuto ragione a fidarmi
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hope that I was right to trust

conjugations.exampleSentence: Mi dispiace che tu abbia avuto questa delusione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I'm sorry that you had this disappointment

conjugations.exampleSentence: È probabile che lei abbia avuto un contrattempo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: It's likely that she had a setback

conjugations.exampleSentence: Temo che noi abbiamo avuto un malinteso
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I fear that we had a misunderstanding

conjugations.exampleSentence: Sono felice che voi abbiate avuto successo
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I'm happy that you had success

conjugations.exampleSentence: Dubito che loro abbiano avuto il tempo di finire
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I doubt that they had time to finish

tenses.description: Used in dependent clauses after expressions of doubt, emotion, or necessity when referring to a completed action in the past. Formed with the present subjunctive of the auxiliary verb plus the past participle.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Se io avessi avuto più coraggio, avrei parlato
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: If I had had more courage, I would have spoken

conjugations.exampleSentence: Credevo che tu avessi avuto una buona ragione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I believed that you had had a good reason

conjugations.exampleSentence: Pensavo che lei avesse avuto un'infanzia difficile
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I thought that she had had a difficult childhood

conjugations.exampleSentence: Se noi avessimo avuto più informazioni, avremmo deciso diversamente
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: If we had had more information, we would have decided differently

conjugations.exampleSentence: Speravo che voi aveste avuto l'opportunità di viaggiare
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I hoped that you had had the opportunity to travel

conjugations.exampleSentence: Dubitavo che loro avessero avuto abbastanza risorse
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I doubted that they had had enough resources

tenses.description: Used in dependent clauses to express an action that occurred before another past action, often in hypothetical or contrary-to-fact statements. Formed with the imperfect subjunctive of the auxiliary verb plus the past participle.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Dopo che io ebbi avuto la conferma, partii subito
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: After I had received confirmation, I left at once

conjugations.exampleSentence: Appena tu avesti avuto notizie, ci chiamasti
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: As soon as you had received news, you called us

conjugations.exampleSentence: Quando lei ebbe avuto il diploma, cercò lavoro
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: When she had gotten her diploma, she looked for work

conjugations.exampleSentence: Dopo che noi avemmo avuto l'approvazione, iniziammo il lavoro
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: After we had gotten approval, we started the work

conjugations.exampleSentence: Appena voi aveste avuto i risultati, li comunicaste
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: As soon as you had gotten the results, you communicated them

conjugations.exampleSentence: Quando loro ebbero avuto tutte le risposte, presero la decisione
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: When they had gotten all the answers, they made the decision

tenses.description: Used in formal and literary Italian to express an action completed immediately before another past action in the remote past. Typically follows time expressions like 'dopo che', 'quando', 'appena'.

conjugations.exampleSentence: È importante avere pazienza
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: It's important to have patience

conjugations.exampleSentence: Voglio avere successo nella vita
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: I want to have success in life

conjugations.exampleSentence: Prima di avere figli, viaggiavano molto
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Before having children, they traveled a lot

tenses.description: The base form of the verb, used after auxiliary verbs, prepositions, and in many other constructions. The infinitive form of 'avere' is used to express possession, necessity, or obligation.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Dopo aver avuto questa esperienza, è diventato più saggio
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: After having had this experience, he became wiser

conjugations.exampleSentence: Senza aver avuto preparazione, affrontò l'esame
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Without having had preparation, she faced the exam

conjugations.exampleSentence: Oltre ad aver avuto successo, è anche rimasto umile
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Besides having had success, he also remained humble

tenses.description: Used to express an action that occurred before the main action. Formed with the infinitive of 'essere' or 'avere' plus the past participle.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Il cliente avente diritto può richiedere il rimborso
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: The client having the right can request a refund

conjugations.exampleSentence: La persona avente esperienza viene preferita
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: The person having experience is preferred

conjugations.exampleSentence: Gli studenti aventi buoni voti ricevono borse di studio
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Students having good grades receive scholarships

conjugations.exampleSentence: Le aziende aventi certificazioni sono più competitive
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Companies having certifications are more competitive

tenses.description: Used as an adjective to describe a noun that is currently performing or having something. Functions as an adjective and agrees with the noun in gender and number.

conjugations.exampleSentence: È avuto successo grazie al suo impegno
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: He had success thanks to his commitment

conjugations.exampleSentence: È avuta una bella opportunità
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: She had a beautiful opportunity

conjugations.exampleSentence: Sono avuti molti complimenti
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They had many compliments

conjugations.exampleSentence: Sono avute grandi soddisfazioni
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: They had great satisfactions

tenses.description: Used to form compound tenses and as an adjective. The past participle of 'avere' is used in compound tenses with 'essere' as auxiliary.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Avendo tempo libero, decise di leggere un libro
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Having free time, he decided to read a book

conjugations.exampleSentence: Avendo esperienza, riuscì a risolvere il problema
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Having experience, she managed to solve the problem

conjugations.exampleSentence: Avendo fiducia in sé stesso, affrontò la sfida
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Having confidence in himself, he faced the challenge

tenses.description: Used to express an action occurring simultaneously with the main action. Functions as an adverb and is invariable.

conjugations.exampleSentence: Avendo avuto questa esperienza, poté dare consigli utili
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Having had this experience, he could give useful advice

conjugations.exampleSentence: Avendo avuto successo, diventò più sicuro di sé
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Having had success, she became more self-confident

conjugations.exampleSentence: Avendo avuto la possibilità, decisero di partire
conjugations.exampleSentenceEn: Having had the opportunity, they decided to leave

tenses.description: Used to express an action that occurred before the main action. Formed with the gerund of 'avere' plus the past participle.
